title.en: Black Bean Mango Stir Fry with Cilantro Lime Coconut Sauce
title.zh: 黑豆芒果用香菜檸檬椰子醬炒

summary.en: Need a dairy free hor d'oeuvre? Black Bean Mango Stir Fry with Cilantro Lime Coconut Sauce could be a great recipe to try. For $2.83 per serving, this recipe covers 16% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe makes 8 servings with 359 calories, 10g of protein, and 8g of fat each. This recipe from Foodista has 3 fans. A mixture of garlic, sriracha sauce/red pepper flakes if desired, agave nectar, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so scrumptious. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 45 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 53%, this dish is solid. Similar recipes include Beef Stir-fry With Black Bean Sauce, Stir-fry Broccoli With Black Bean Sauce, and Asparagus Stir-Fry With Black Bean Sauce.
summary.zh: 需要免費的乳製品嗎？黑豆芒果用香菜檸檬椰子醬炒菜可能是一個很好的食譜。每份2.83美元，此食譜涵蓋了您對維生素和礦物質的日常需求的16％。該食譜可提供8份，每份359卡路里，10克蛋白質和8克脂肪。來自Goodista的食譜有3位粉絲。如果需要，將大蒜，sriracha醬/紅辣椒片混合在一起，龍舌蘭花蜜和少量其他成分都需要使這種食譜如此美味。從準備到盤子，此食譜大約需要45分鐘。這道菜的勺子得分為53％。類似的食譜包括用黑豆醬牛肉炒，黑豆醬炒西蘭花，以及蘆筍炒菜和黑豆醬。

instructions.en: Directions: To make the sauce, blend the coconut milk, cilantro, lime juice, ginger, garlic, soy sauce and agave nectar in a blender until smooth; set aside. Prepare rice noodles according to instructions (they often vary). In a large, deep skillet or wok over medium-high, heat oil until shimmering. Add crab/shrimp oil and saut until cooked through and lightly browned, about 4 to 5 minutes. Add veggies and mango and saut until veggies are lightly tender, about 4 to 5 minutes longer. Stir in the stir fry sauce and noodles. Cook for another minute or until the noodles are hot. Sprinkle with additional sriraccha, salt and pepper and red pepper flakes as desired. Makes 8 servings.
instructions.zh: 方向：為了製作醬汁，將椰奶，香菜，檸檬汁，姜，大蒜，醬油和龍舌蘭花蜜混合在攪拌機中，直至光滑；放在一邊。根據指示準備米粉（它們通常會有所不同）。在大型的深層煎鍋中或在中高的鍋中加熱油，直至閃閃發光。加入蟹/蝦油，然後炒至煮熟並淺褐色，約4至5分鐘。加入蔬菜和芒果，然後炒至蔬菜略微嫩，大約4至5分鐘。攪拌炒醬和麵條。煮一分鐘，或直到麵條變熱。根據需要撒上額外的sriraccha，鹽和胡椒粉以及紅辣椒片。做8份。

name.en: sriracha sauce/red pepper flakes if desired
sriracha sauce/red pepper flakes if desired

title.en: Creamy Polenta with Egg, Arrabiata & Bacon
title.zh: 奶油玉米粥配雞蛋，阿拉比亞和培根

summary.en: If you have roughly 45 minutes to spend in the kitchen, Creamy Polenta with Egg, Arrabiata & Bacon might be an outstanding gluten free recipe to try. For $2.88 per serving, this recipe covers 18% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 4. One serving contains 667 calories, 24g of protein, and 48g of fat. This recipe from Foodista requires polenta, cream cheese, goat cheese, and parsley. 103 people have tried and liked this recipe. It works well as a main course. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 53%. This score is solid. Creamy Polenta with Bacon and Sage, Creamy Polenta with Bacon and Cranberries, and Poached Egg over Creamy Polenta are very similar to this recipe.
summary.zh: 如果您大約有45分鐘的時間在廚房裡，奶油玉米粥配雞蛋，Arrabiata＆Bacon可能是一種出色的無麩質食譜。每份2.88美元，此食譜涵蓋了您對維生素和礦物質的每日需求的18％。該食譜提供4。一份含有667卡路里，24克蛋白質和48克脂肪。來自Goodista的食譜需要玉米粥，奶油奶酪，山羊奶酪和歐芹。 103人嘗試並喜歡這個食譜。它可以作為主課程運作良好。考慮到所有因素，我們認為這個食譜值得獲得53％的勺子得分。這個分數很紮實。帶有培根和鼠尾草的奶油玉米粥，帶有培根和蔓越莓的奶油玉米粥以及奶油玉米粥上的荷包蛋與此食譜非常相似。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.
Step 2: Bring 4 cups of water to a boil in a medium saucepan. Slowly whisk in the polenta, whisking continuously until there are no lumps and it begins to thicken slightly. Reduce the heat to medium-low and allow the polenta to simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally to keep it from overcooking.
Step 3: When the polenta has thickened and become tender, stir in the goat cheese and cream cheese. Stir until the cheese are melted and fully incorporated into the polenta. Add salt and pepper to taste.
Step 4: Meanwhile, place the bacon on a parchment-lined baking sheet and place in the preheated oven on the middle rack. Roast for 15-18 minutes or until the bacon is golden and crisp. When it is done, remove it from the oven and place the bacon strips on a paper towel-lined plate. Set aside.
Step 5: In a small saucepan or in the microwave, heat the marinara sauce until just simmering. Keep warm until you are ready to assemble your bowls.
Step 6: In a large non-stick skillet, heat the 1 T olive oil over medium heat. If your pan is large enough, add the four eggs and allow them to cook until the whites are opaque but still a bit runny on the top. Put a lid over the pan and turn off the heat. Allow the eggs to continue cooking under the lid until the whites are set but the yolk is still runny. If your pan is small, fry the eggs in batches.
Step 7: To assemble the bowls, spoon even amounts of polenta in each bowl. Top with a spoonful of the arrabiata, 1 egg and 2 slices of bacon. Garnish with chopped thyme or parsley leaves. Serve immediately.
instructions.zh: 步驟1：將烤箱預熱至425度F.Step 2：將4杯水煮沸。慢慢攪拌玉米粥，連續攪拌直至沒有腫塊，並開始略微變稠。將熱量降低至中低，並讓玉米粥慢火煮30分鐘，偶爾攪拌以防止過度煮熟。攪拌直至奶酪融化並完全摻入玉米粥中。加入鹽和胡椒粉調味。步驟4：與此同時，將培根放在襯有羊皮紙的烤盤上，並將其放入中間架子的預熱烤箱中。烤15-18分鐘，或直到培根變成金黃色和酥脆。完成後，將其從烤箱中取出，然後將培根條放在紙巾襯板上。放在一邊。步驟5：在一個小鍋中或在微波爐中，加熱醃料醬，直到煮至。保持溫暖，直到準備組裝碗。如果您的鍋足夠大，請加入四個雞蛋，然後讓它們煮至白色不透明，但頂部仍然有點流鼻涕。將蓋子放在鍋上，關閉熱量。允許雞蛋繼續在蓋子下烹飪，直到凝固白色，但蛋黃仍然流鼻涕。如果您的鍋很小，請分批炸雞蛋。步驟7：要組裝碗，每個碗中的尖玉玉米是湯匙。頂上一湯匙的阿拉比亞，1個雞蛋和2片培根。用切碎的百里香或歐芹葉裝飾。立即服務。

summary.en: Need a gluten free, dairy free, lacto ovo vegetarian, and vegan hor d'oeuvre? Edamame Hummus could be an awesome recipe to try. This recipe serves 6. For 67 cents per serving, this recipe covers 6% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One serving contains 177 calories, 6g of protein, and 14g of fat. It is brought to you by Foodista. 4 people were glad they tried this recipe. This recipe is typical of middl eastern cuisine. If you have ground coriander, garlic, flat-leaf parsley, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 45 minutes. Overall, this recipe earns a solid spoonacular score of 56%. Edamame Hummus, Edamame Hummus, and Edamame Hummus are very similar to this recipe.
summary.zh: 需要無麩質，無乳製品，乳酸元素素食和素食主義者的素食主義者？毛豆鷹嘴豆泥可能是一個很棒的食譜。該食譜可提供6。對於每份67美分，該食譜涵蓋了您對維生素和礦物質的日常需求的6％。一份含有177卡路里，6克蛋白質和14克脂肪。它是由Goodista帶給您的。 4個人很高興他們嘗試了這個食譜。該食譜是Middl東部美食的典型代表。如果您有磨碎的香菜，大蒜，平葉歐芹以及手頭上的其他一些成分，則可以做到。從準備到盤子，此食譜大約需要45分鐘。總體而言，此食譜的穩固片分評分為56％。 Edamame Hummus，Edamame Hummus和Edamame Hummus與此食譜非常相似。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Boil the edamame in salted water for 4 to 5 minutes. Drain.
Step 2: In a food processor, puree the Edamame, tahini, water, lemon zest and juice, garlic, salt, cumin, coriander, and chili flakes (optional) until smooth.
Step 3: With the motor running, slowly drizzle in 2 tablespoons of olive oil and mix until absorbed.
Step 4: Transfer to a small bowl, stir in the parsley and drizzle with remaining oil. Serve, or refrigerate, covered, up to 3 days.
instructions.zh: 步驟1：將毛豆在鹽水中煮沸4至5分鐘。排水。步驟2：在食品加工機中，將毛豆，芝麻醬，水，檸檬皮和果汁，大蒜，鹽，小茴香，香菜和辣椒片（可選）（可選）（可選）直至光滑。食用或冷藏，覆蓋長達3天。

title.en: Baked Eggs and Bacon Cream In Spinach Fettuccine Nests
title.zh: 菠菜普口巢中的烤雞蛋和培根奶油

summary.en: The recipe Baked Eggs and Bacon Cream In Spinach Fettuccine Nests can be made in about 45 minutes. For $1.66 per serving, this recipe covers 14% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One portion of this dish contains about 21g of protein, 51g of fat, and a total of 556 calories. This recipe serves 3. 4 people have made this recipe and would make it again. Head to the store and pick up bacon, heavy cream, scallions, and a few other things to make it today. It works well as an affordable main course. It is brought to you by Foodista. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 35%. This score is not so amazing. If you like this recipe, take a look at these similar recipes: Baked Eggs With Bacon And Spinach, Baked Eggs with Spinach Bacon and Avocado, and Fettuccine with Bacon and Eggs.
summary.zh: 食譜烤雞蛋和培根奶油可以在大約45分鐘內製成菠菜葡萄牙巢中。每份1.66美元，此食譜涵蓋了您對維生素和礦物質的每日需求的14％。這道菜的一部分含有約21克蛋白質，51克脂肪和總共556卡路里。該食譜為3.4人提供了這個食譜，並將再次製作。前往商店，拿起培根，濃奶油，蔥和其他一些東西。它可以作為負擔得起的主課程運作良好。它是由Goodista帶給您的。考慮到所有因素，我們認為這個食譜值得得到35％的勺子得分。這個分數並不是那麼驚人。如果您喜歡此食譜，請查看這些類似的食譜：烤雞蛋和菠菜，菠菜培根和鱷梨的烤雞蛋，以及帶有培根和雞蛋的烏茨芬奇。

instructions.en: I begin with my bacon (Ive never had bacon this fresh before, from an entirely organic source so close to home that my husband is literally feeding next seasons pork belly), which I chop and try out to nice crispy cubelets. Now the rest of the meal will take less than 25 minutes: 10 minutes to boil the pasta, make the sauce, and assemble the dish (and, if youre like me, some sub-urb biscuits), and 15 minutes to bake it (while you make a quick salad). So be ready. I melt my butter in my wok over high heat. I throw my pasta nests into the salted boiling water on the back burner. When my butter is melted and just begging to tan, I add my heavy cream and blend well. I bring this to a simmer for a moment. Then I add 3/4 of my cheese, which Ive shredded. (The rest I will thinly shave for a final garnish.) I blend this well, bringing it to a low simmer to thicken, until it forms a smooth sauce. I also add some salt and pepper. (Crushed red pepper flakes, nutmeg, paprika, maybe even a dash of curry powder would work nicely here, too.) Finally, I add 3/4 of my cooked bacon, and blend well with the sauce, until the flavors are beautifully infused. Its been 10 minutes, and my 11 minute pasta is just slightly undercooked (I know, cuz I bit off a snippet) perfect! Using tongs and a meshed spoon, I transfer my pasta to the waiting bacon cream, and toss well. I add a tablespoon, maybe, of the pasta water, too, just to keep the sauce wet enough to bake later. Using my tongs, I spin 1/2 of the pasta and sauce into each of two medium (10oz) ceramic ramekins, which Ive brushed down with melted butter. I sprinkle most of the rest of my bacon (reserving a few chunks for a final flourish) on top. The piece of resistance: a whole, cracked, raw egg, dropped into a wee basket I left in the middle of my pasta and sauce nests. I manage to keep the yolk whole only in one, but the other I rather hold together by virtue of a cleverly placed noodle and some dribbled sauce. I place these into a 350 oven to bake for 15 minutes, or until the whites have set, but the yolk is still glossy and runny. After coring the best bits out of a loaf of bread destined for nothing (since my husband purchased a fresher loaf of preferred pan this afternoon) with a properly sized wine-glass rim, I brushed each disk with melted butter, and layered them with some of my sprinkled cheese into 4 cups of a buttered muffin tin, and then I stuck them in my oven along with my pasta nests to brown. I consider these my sub-urb Wonderbread biscuits: quick, easy, and yummy, leaving fodder for crotons (or compost). I also threw together a quick salad of baby greens, sliced onion, strips of roasted red peppers, black olives, EVOO, and salt and pepper. Not that dinner needed these accoutrement my simmering, saucy noodle nests of runny yolk baked eggs, bac
instructions.zh: 我從培根開始（我從來沒有從一個完全有機的來源那裡得到這個新鮮的培根，以至於我丈夫從字面上餵了下個季節的豬肚），我將其切碎，然後嘗試酥脆的雞肉cublet。現在，剩下的一頓飯將不到25分鐘：10分鐘即可煮意大利面，製作醬汁並組裝盤子（如果您喜歡我的話，是一些子餅乾），15分鐘將其烘烤（當您製作快速沙拉時）。所以準備好。我用高火融化黃油。我將意大利面巢扔進後燃燒器上的鹽水。當我的黃油融化並只是乞求棕褐色時，我加了濃奶油並融合得很好。我把這個煮了一會兒。然後，我加入了3/4的奶酪，這是我切碎的。 （其餘的我會刮刮最後的裝飾。）我很好地融合了它，使其慢慢煮得很厚，直到形成光滑的醬汁為止。我還加了一些鹽和胡椒粉。 （壓碎的紅辣椒片，肉荳蔻，辣椒粉，甚至可能在這裡也可以很好地工作。）最後，我加入了3/4煮熟的培根，並與醬汁融合在一起，直到風味精美地註入。已經有10分鐘了，我的11分鍾意大利面的煮熟略微不足（我知道，因為我咬了一個片段）！用鉗子和網狀勺子，我將意大利面轉移到等待的培根奶油中，然後很好地折騰。我也可能加入一湯匙意大利面水，只是為了使醬汁濕潤以稍後烘烤。用鉗子，我將1/2的麵食和醬汁旋轉到兩個培養基（10盎司）陶瓷小模子中的每一種中，ive用融化的黃油刷了下來。我將其餘的大部分培根撒在上面。阻力：整個，破裂的生雞蛋，掉進了我在意大利面和醬汁巢中間留下的小籃子。我設法僅將蛋黃整體放在一個中，但另一個我寧願憑一個巧妙的麵條和一些運輸的醬汁固定在一起。我將它們放入350烤箱中烘烤15分鐘，或者直到白色凝固為止，但是蛋黃仍然有光澤和流鼻涕。在用一條無所事事的一條麵包中加油（因為我丈夫今天下午我購買了一條新鮮的首選鍋），並用適當尺寸的酒玻璃邊緣將每個盤用融化的黃油刷了，然後將它們與我的一些灑水奶酪一起分成一杯黃油的木薯粉，然後將它們與我的牛角固定在一起，然後將它們與我的Overa一起粘貼，以使其粘在我的O. overa中。我認為這些我的子圖像餅乾餅乾：快速，輕鬆且美味，留下飼料（或堆肥）。我還一起扔了一個快速的小蔬菜沙拉，切成薄片的洋蔥，烤紅辣椒，黑橄欖，evoo和鹽和胡椒粉。並不是說晚餐需要這些裝飾，我的雜物，saucy的麵條巢的蛋黃烤雞蛋，bac

summary.en: If you want to add more pescatarian recipes to your recipe box, Barnaby's Caesar Salad might be a recipe you should try. This main course has 595 calories, 21g of protein, and 41g of fat per serving. For $2.38 per serving, this recipe covers 24% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 4. Only a few people really liked this American dish. A mixture of anchovy paste, parmigiano reggiano cheese, romaine lettuce, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so flavorful. 3 people found this recipe to be scrumptious and satisfying. It is brought to you by Foodista. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 79%. This score is pretty good. If you like this recipe, you might also like recipes such as Grilled Caesar Salad with Light Caesar Salad Dressing, Chicken Caesar Salad with Garlic Croutons {and Light Caesar Dressing}, and Chicken Caesar Salad with Garlic Croutons {and Light Caesar Dressing}.
summary.zh: 如果您想在食譜盒中添加更多pescatarian食譜，那麼Barnaby的Caesar Salad可能是您應該嘗試的食譜。該主療程具有595卡路里，21克蛋白質和每份41克脂肪。每份2.38美元，此食譜涵蓋了您對維生素和礦物質的每日需求的24％。這個食譜為4。只有少數人真的很喜歡這種美國菜。 anthan魚糊，帕米亞諾·雷吉亞諾（Parmigiano Reggiano）奶酪，romaine生菜和少量其他成分的混合物就是使這種食譜變得如此美味。 3個人發現這個食譜令人著迷和令人滿意。它是由Goodista帶給您的。從製備到盤子，此食譜大約需要45分鐘。考慮到所有因素，我們認為這個食譜值得得到79％的孢子分數。這個分數很好。如果您喜歡這種食譜，您可能還喜歡食譜，例如烤凱撒沙拉，淡淡的凱撒沙拉沙拉醬，雞肉凱撒沙拉和大蒜麵包丁（和淺凱撒醬}，以及雞肉凱撒沙拉，配大蒜麵包醬（和淺凱撒調味料}）。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Combine lemon juice and anchovy paste in a blender.
Step 2: Start blender and drizzle olive into mixture until it thickens.
Step 3: Cut bread into 1 inch cubes and toast until brown. The trick here is to have it crispy on the outside and soft on the inside.
Step 4: Combine lettuce and bread cubes in a salad bowl and cover with Parmigiano Reggiano (Parmesan) cheese.
Step 5: Pour dressing over top and toss.
instructions.zh: 步驟1：將檸檬汁和an魚醬混合在攪拌機中。步驟2：攪拌攪拌器，然後將橄欖淋上混合物，直到變稠。步驟3：將麵包切成1英寸的立方體，吐司直至褐色。這裡的訣竅是要在外部酥脆，並在內部變軟。步驟4：在沙拉碗中混合生菜和麵包塊，並用帕爾瑪諾·雷吉亞諾（Parmigiano Reggiano）（Parmesan）奶酪蓋住奶酪。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Turn oven on to lowest setting and place your plates inside.
Step 2: Prepare your pre bought flour tortilla wraps by sprinkling each tortilla with a little water then stacking them together, wrap in tin foil and place in the oven alongside the plates.
Step 3: Prepare the chicken, cut chicken thighs into strips and mix with onion salt, chilli power, oregano, paprika and oil in a bowl and toss to coat. set aside.
Step 4: Salsa Verde: Place the chili, garlic, green onion, coriander, mint and vegetable oil in a food processor and pulse until combined. Set aside later for serving. Makes 1 cup (250ml).
Step 5: Guacamole: Scoop out flesh of 1 ripe Avocado, Chop and de-seed 1 red chilli and add to the Avocado, Squeeze in juice of 1/2 lime and mix to combine. Set aside later for serving
Step 6: Sour Cream: Turn out tub of sour cream into a serving bowl, sprinkle lightly over the top with course black pepper. set aside.
Step 7: Preheat a char-grill pan or barbecue over high heat. Char-grill or barbecue the chicken for 4-5 minutes each side or until cooked through.
Step 8: Chop 1 red bell pepper into lengthy strips and toss on the hot griddle for 1 min.
Step 9: Place the Chicken in a serving bowl, with pepper and bring the Salsa Verde, Guacamole and sour cream to the table along with hot plates and the tortilla wraps. Serve with extra fresh bowl of coriander leaves and lime wedges. .
Step 10: Serves 6

instructions.en: Pre-heat the oven to 200 deg Celsius (400 F). Start by roasting the beetroots. Clean the beets of all mud and trim the stems. Wrap each beet tightly in aluminum foil. Place the wrapped beets on a pan and in a 200 deg Celsius oven for 30 to 40mins. They are done when they are very tender. While the beets are cooking, use a peeler and peel an orange, taking note to get as much of zest and as little of pith (the white parts) as possible. Stack the strips of orange zest and cut into fine strips with a sharp knife. Set aside. Clean and dry the duck breasts. Score the skin of the duck. Make cuts into the fat layer and take care not to cut into the meat layer. Rub some salt into the skin side only of the duck. Add the duck breasts to a clean and COLD pan. Do not add any oil. Place the pan on the stove and turn the heat to medium. As the pan heats up, the fat from the duck will render off and the skin will brown beautifully. Always keep the heat to between medium to medium-high. Never use high heat as the skin will burn before the duck is cooked through. Once the skin is a gorgeous dark golden brown, flip the duck breasts to the other side and cook for a few more minutes till the other sides are also golden brown. Be careful not to overcook the duck. Set the cooked duck aside and leave to rest covered with foil. Duck, like beef must be rested. The resting time is half that of cooking time. If the duck was cooked for 6 mins, then it should be rested for at least 3 minutes. While the duck is resting, make the vinaigrette. Squeeze the juice of the zested orange into a bowl. About 5 to 6 tablespoons of juice. Add 2 tablespoons of extra virgin olive oil. Use the best quality one you have. Add 4 teaspoons of balsamic vinegar. Add salt and pepper to taste. Whisk the mixture well. Set aside. When the beets are done, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes so that they are easier to hold. Put on some disposable gloves (else get blood red stained fingers later). Open the foil-wrapped beets. Using the rough surface of each piece of foil, rub the beets with the foil to remove the skin. Cut the cooked beets into small pieces. Set aside in a bowl. Drizzle 2 tablespoons of vinaigrette into the beets. Add 2 teaspoons of honey. Toss well to coat the beets with the dressing. Slice the rested duck into thin slices. The meat should be a beautiful pink. Serve by layering the salad with greens, nuts and cheese of your choice, and the duck and beets. I like rocket greens with fresh basil or mint, mandarin orange segments, toasted almond flakes or pine nuts and some shaved parmesan cheese or some crumbed feta or goats cheese. Garnish with the orange zest. Trickle the vinaigrette over the salad. Best served immediately.
instructions.zh: 將烤箱預熱至200攝氏度（400 F）。首先烤甜菜根。清潔所有泥的甜菜，並修剪莖。將每個甜菜緊緊包裹在鋁箔中。將包裹的甜菜放在鍋上，並在200攝氏度的烤箱中放置30至40分鐘。當它們非常溫柔時，它們就完成了。在甜菜烹飪時，使用剝皮器並剝橙子，並註意盡可能多的皮（白色部位）。將橙皮的條堆疊在一起，用鋒利的刀切成細條。放在一邊。清潔並乾燥鴨乳房。為鴨子的皮膚評分。切入脂肪層，注意不要切入肉層。僅在鴨的皮膚一側擦一些鹽。將鴨胸部加入乾淨的冷鍋中。不要添加任何油。將鍋放在爐子上，然後將熱量轉換為中等。隨著鍋的加熱，鴨子的脂肪會脫落，皮膚會變褐色。始終將熱量保持在中高之間。切勿使用高熱量，因為在鴨子煮熟之前，皮膚會燃燒。一旦皮膚變成了華麗的深金黃色棕色，將鴨胸部翻轉到另一側，再煮幾分鐘，直到另一側也變成金黃色。注意不要過度煮鴨子。將煮熟的鴨子放在一邊，然後留下箔紙覆蓋。鴨，像牛肉一樣必須休息。休息時間是烹飪時間的一半。如果將鴨子煮了6分鐘，則應將其休息至少3分鐘。鴨休息時，製作醋。將橙汁的果汁擠進碗中。大約5至6湯匙果汁。加2湯匙特級初榨橄欖油。使用最好的質量。加4茶匙香醋。加入鹽和胡椒粉調味。很好地攪拌混合物。放在一邊。甜菜完成後，將它們從烤箱中取出，讓它們冷卻幾分鐘，以便容易握住。戴上一些一次性手套（否則稍後再染成紅色的手指）。打開箔包裹的甜菜。使用每片箔的粗糙表面，用箔紙擦拭甜菜以去除皮膚。將煮熟的甜菜切成小塊。放在碗裡。淋上2湯匙醋的葡萄片到甜菜中。加2茶匙蜂蜜。很好地折騰，用敷料塗上甜菜。將剩下的鴨子切成薄片。肉應該是美麗的粉紅色。通過在選擇的蔬菜，堅果和奶酪以及鴨子和甜菜的情況下將沙拉分層。我喜歡新鮮的羅勒或薄荷的火箭蔬菜，普通話橙色的片段，烤杏仁片或鬆子堅果以及一些剃光的帕爾瑪奶酪或一些脆皮的羊乳酪或山羊奶酪。用橙皮裝飾。在沙拉上滴下醋。最好立即提供。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Instructions Combine the creole seasoning ingredients in a small bowl and set aside.
Step 2: Melt butter in a large dutch oven over medium-high heat.
Step 3: Add the sausage until it starts to brown, about 3 minutes.
Step 4: Add the chicken and continue to cook until brown, about 3-5 minutes.
Step 5: Stir frequently.
Step 6: Turn the stove top down to medium heat.
Step 7: Preheat your oven to 350 degrees.
Step 8: Stir in the seasoning mix of cajun spices and 1/2 of the chopped onion, celery, green bell pepper, and garlic.
Step 9: Cook until vegetables get tender, about 3-5 minutes.
Step 10: Stir frequently and scrape the bottom of the pot frequently.
Step 11: Stir in the tomato sauce and cook for about one minute.
Step 12: Stir in the remaining onion, celery, bell pepper, garlic, and the diced tomatoes then remove from heat.
Step 13: Stir in the rice and chicken stock, mix the ingredients well.
Step 14: Bake uncovered in the oven at 350 degrees for one hour or until the rice is tender but still has a little crunch.
Step 15: Remove from the oven, add the bay leaves and stir well.
Step 16: Allow the dish to cool for five minutes before serving.
Step 17: OPTIONAL: Top with green onions before serving.

instructions.en: Begin by preparing the pancake batter. Whisk together the rice flour, egg, sea salt, turmeric, cayenne and green chili. Gradually whisk in the coconut milk. The mixture should be a smooth, semi-thick batter that is of pouring consistency. Add a little water if necessary. Cover and set aside while you prepare the rest of the food.Now prepare the sauce. Whisk together all of the ingredients and set aside.For the filling, combine the carrot, radish, green onions, green chilies and snow peas. Put the herbs in another bowl and have your sprouts ready along with the mushrooms.Heat a teaspoon of oil over medium heat in a non-stick skillet. When hot, ladle 1/2 cup of batter into the pan and spread with the bottom of the ladle until you have a roughly 6 to 8 inch pancake. Fry for 6 to 8 minutes or until you have small holes forming and the bottom is crispy brown, then flip and fry for another few minutes on the other side. Transfer to a plate and keep warm in a 150 oven while you finish the rest of the pancakes you should finish with 4 to 6 pancakes.To serve, scatter a portion of the vegetables, herbs and mushrooms over one half of the pancake. Sprinkle some sauce over top and fold the pancake. Drizzle with more sauce and there you go.
instructions.zh: 首先準備煎餅麵糊。將米粉，雞蛋，海鹽，薑黃，墨西哥辣椒和綠色辣椒攪拌在一起。逐漸在椰奶中攪拌。混合物應該是一個光滑，半厚的麵糊，是澆築一致性的。如有必要，加一點水。準備其餘食物時蓋上蓋子並放在一邊。現在準備醬汁。將所有成分攪拌在一起，並放在一旁。將胡蘿蔔，蘿蔔，綠洋蔥，綠色辣椒和豌豆結合在一起。將草藥放入另一個碗中，並與蘑菇一起準備好您的芽菜。用不粘鍋中的中火加熱一茶匙油。熱時，將1/2杯麵糊加載到鍋中，並用鋼包的底部散佈，直到您有大約6到8英寸的煎餅。炸6到8分鐘，或直到形成小孔，底部為酥脆的棕色，然後翻轉並在另一側炸幾分鐘。在完成其餘的煎餅時，請在150個烤箱中轉移到盤子上，並在150個烤箱中保持溫暖，以4至6個煎餅結束。要食用，將一部分蔬菜，草藥和蘑菇撒超過一半的煎餅。在頂部撒一些醬汁，然後折疊煎餅。淋上更多的醬汁，你去那裡。

instructions.en: Place a large (this is key) pot of water to boil. Salt when it boils, not before. Meanwhile, make the pesto: In a mortar (or use a food processor with a blade) pound together the oil, almonds and pine-nuts. Add the garlic, 2 ice cubes and the rest of the ingredients, pounding quickly to make a paste.You want to leave a bit of a texture for crunch. Cook the pasta al dente, as per directions, drain and reserve some of the boiling water. Toss the pasta with the pesto, using some of the reserved water to make it creamier. Grate some fresh pecorino or ricotta salata (or both) over and serve hot with a leaf of basil to garnish.
instructions.zh: 放一個大（這是鑰匙）的水以煮沸。煮沸時鹽，而不是以前。同時，製作香蒜醬：在砂漿中（或使用帶有刀片的食物加工機）將油，杏仁和松木砸在一起。加入大蒜，2個冰塊和其餘成分，迅速敲打以製成糊狀。按照指示煮意大利面，瀝乾並保留一些沸水。用香蒜醬將意大利面倒入意大利面，並使用一些預留的水使其更奶油。將一些新鮮的Pecorino或意大利乳清乾酪薩拉塔（或兩者都）磨碎，並與羅勒葉一起熱食。

instructions.en: Cut the chicken breast into cubes. In a mixing bowl, marinate the chicken with orange juice, rice vinegar, rice wine, hot chili sauce, brown sugar, and minced garlic. Cover the chicken with plastic wrap and press down so the marinade will soak the chicken evenly. Refrigerate for 1 hour. While waiting for the chicken to marinate, prepare the vegetables. Chop the onion into square pieces. Chop green onions and separate the white and green parts. Zest the orange. In a saut pan, add vegetable oil and turn to high heat. Add in the chicken and saut for 1 minute. Toss the chicken and saut for another minute or until caramelized. Transfer the chicken to a dish. Continue to use high heat. Add the chopped onion to the pan and saut until soft. Add the chicken back to the pan, with the white parts of the green onion and orange zest. Cook for about 30 seconds. Add the liquid to the pan and let it simmer to 30 seconds. Add the remaining green onion to the pan and let the sauce continue to reduce and thicken. When the sauce is reduced to desired consistency, add salt and pepper to taste. The orange chicken is done. Serve over white rice.
instructions.zh: 將雞胸肉切成方塊。在攪拌碗中，用橙汁，米醋，米飯，熱辣椒醬，紅糖和碎大蒜醃製雞肉。用保鮮膜蓋住雞肉，然後按下，以便醃料將雞均勻地浸泡。冷藏1小時。在等待雞肉醃製的同時，準備蔬菜。將洋蔥切成平方。切碎綠色洋蔥，將白色和綠色部分分開。熱橙色。在炒鍋中，加入植物油，然後變成高火。加入雞肉，炒1分鐘。將雞肉和炒一分鐘或炒至焦糖。將雞肉轉移到盤子上。繼續使用高溫。將切碎的洋蔥加入鍋中，然後炒至變軟。將雞肉與綠色洋蔥和橙皮的白色部分一起倒回鍋中。煮約30秒。將液體加入鍋中，然後將其小火煮至30秒。將剩餘的綠色洋蔥加到鍋中，讓醬汁繼續減少並變稠。當醬汁降低到所需的稠度時，加入鹽和胡椒粉調味。橙色的雞肉已經完成。用白米飯食用。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 F.
Step 2: Spray an 8x8 inch pan with cooking spray. Set aside.
Step 3: In a food processor, puree kidney beans and beets. Transfer to a large bowl.
Step 4: Add remaining ingredients and mix by hand until smooth and fully combined.
Step 5: Fold batter into the greased pan.
Step 6: Bake for 35-40 minutes, turning the pan halfway through.
Step 7: When the brownies are done, test them with a toothpick. You want some batter to cling to the toothpick. Do not over bake.
Step 8: Let cool completely. Refrigerate for one hour.
Step 9: Cut into squares or use cookie cutters to make heart shapes.
instructions.zh: 步驟1：將烤箱預熱至350 f.Step 2：用烹飪噴霧劑噴灑8x8英寸的鍋。留在一邊。轉移到一個大碗中。步驟4：添加剩餘的成分，用手混合直至光滑整合。步驟5：將麵糊折疊到塗有油脂的鍋中。步驟6：烘烤35-40分鐘，將鍋翻到一半。步入中途7：巧克力蛋糕完成後，用牙籤進行測試。您想讓一些麵糊粘在牙籤上。不要烘烤。步驟8：完全冷卻。冷藏一個小時。步驟9：切成正方形或使用餅乾切割機製作心形。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a 10-inch skillet over medium heat. Add the beef and cook until well browned on both sides and until desired doneness, about 10 minutes for medium-rare. Remove the beef from the skillet.
Step 2: Heat 1 tablespoon butter and the remaining oil in the skillet. Add the mushrooms and cook for 5 minutes or until tender, stirring occasionally. Add the shallot, garlic and rosemary and cook and stir for 30 seconds. Stir in the concentrated broth, water and remaining butter and cook until the butter is melted.
Step 3: Cut the beef diagonally against the grain into thin slices. Serve the mushroom mixture with the beef.
instructions.zh: 步驟1：用中火加熱1湯匙油。加入牛肉並煮至兩側呈褐色，直至達到所需的味道，大約10分鐘的中等稀有。從煎鍋中取出牛肉。步驟2：加熱1湯匙黃油和煎鍋中剩餘的油。加入蘑菇，煮5分鐘或直到變軟，偶爾攪拌。加入蔥，大蒜和迷迭香，煮30秒。攪拌濃縮的湯，水和剩餘的黃油，然後煮至黃油融化。步驟3：將牛肉對角線切成薄片。將蘑菇混合物與牛肉一起食用。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Season your thawed chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Add a little bit of olive oil to your frying pan, add chicken, and cook through. Remove chicken from pan, then add diced onions to the pan. Turn heat to medium and let onions saute through. (You may need to add a little bit more oil to the pan.)
Step 2: Meanwhile, chop up your chicken (or shred) very finely. When the onions are soft and translucent, add chicken back to the pan. Season your onions and chicken with garlic, cumin, and chili powder. Finely chop up your jalapeno and add that and your green chilis to your chicken mixture. Stir in your cheese. Now you are ready to assemble.
Step 3: Heat up your olive oil in a small frying pan. Add your corn tortilla for about 20 seconds, flipping if the oil doesn't reach the top side. Doing this softens your tortilla so it won't break as you roll it. Do this with all your tortillas and drain on paper towels.
Step 4: Take 2 cookie sheets and spray with cooking spray. Lay out a tortilla and add about 2 TBSP of chicken mixture to the middle of your tortilla. Roll up. Fill the remaining tortillas in the same way and line them up next to each other on your cookie sheet, so they are very close to each other, but not touching. This should make two rows on each of your cookie sheets.
Step 5: If two pans are too much for your family, then at this point, take one pan and put it in your freezer. Once the enchiladas are frozen, remove them from the pan and stack them in a double lined ziploc freezer bag. When you want to make them, simply line them up again on a greased cookie sheet, let thaw for about an hour on the counter, then bake as instructed.)
Step 6: Now, bake your enchiladas in the oven, at 400 degrees, for about 20 minutes. They should be lightly browned. Remove them from the oven and spoon over about 2TBSP of your enchilada sauce over the top of each enchilada. Then sprinkle the tops with cheese. Put the enchiladas back in the oven for about 7 minutes. After that, it's time to eat!
instructions.zh: 步驟1：用鹽和胡椒粉調味您解凍的雞胸肉。在煎鍋中加入一點橄欖油，加雞，然後煮。從鍋中取出雞肉，然後在鍋中加入切丁的洋蔥。將熱量轉換為中等，讓洋蔥炒過。 （您可能需要在鍋中加入更多的油。）步驟2：同時，將雞肉（或切碎）切碎。當洋蔥柔軟且半透明時，將雞肉倒回鍋中。用大蒜，小茴香和辣椒粉調味洋蔥和雞肉。將您的墨西哥胡椒切碎，然後將其添加到雞肉混合物中。攪拌奶酪。現在您準備好組裝。步驟3：在小煎鍋中加熱橄欖油。加入玉米餅約20秒鐘，如果油未達到頂部，請翻轉。這樣做會使您的玉米餅變軟，因此滾動時不會破裂。用所有的玉米餅進行操作，然後在紙巾上排開。佈置玉米餅，並在玉米餅的中間加約2湯匙雞肉混合物。捲起。以相同的方式填充剩餘的玉米餅，然後在餅乾紙上彼此對齊，因此它們彼此非常近，但不要碰到。這應該在每個餅乾紙上都有兩行。步驟5：如果兩個鍋為您的家人來說太多了，那麼此時，請拿起一個鍋並將其放入冰箱中。將玉米片冷凍後，將它們從鍋中取出，然後將其堆放在雙襯有襯裡的Ziploc冷凍袋中。當您想製作它們時，只需在塗有油脂的餅乾紙上再次將它們排成一列，在櫃檯上解凍約一個小時，然後按照指示烘烤。 ）他們應該變褐色。將它們從烤箱和湯匙上取出約2tbsp的辣醬玉米餅醬，每個辣醬玉米餅餡的頂部。然後撒上奶酪。將辣醬玉米片放回烤箱中約7分鐘。之後，該吃飯了！

instructions.en:
Step 1: For the Turkey:
Step 2: Method: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Slit a pocket laterally in the turkey breast. Julienne the dried fruit and the spinach and mix in a bowl with the chopped shallot. Stuff the mixture into the turkey breast and season with salt and pepper, coat with the melted butter and wrap in sheet of foil. Heat a large skillet until it is very hot and place the turkey in the pan and allow to cook for about two minutes on each side or until it is golden brown on all sides (you will have to peek inside the foil to check). Place the pan in the oven and cook for 15 minutes then flip the breasts and cook for an additional 20 to 30 minutes or until a probe thermometer inserted into the middle of the breast reads 165 degrees. Remove the pan from the oven and place the pan on a cutting board and allow to rest for five minutes. Remove the turkey from the foil then carve into 1 inch thick medallions
Step 3: For the sauce:
Step 4: Method: In a non-reactive saucepan bring the vinegar and the sugar to a boil. Cook the mixture till the sugar begins to caramelize (Brown). Add the Stock to the mixture quickly so that the caramel does not burn then add the hibiscus flowers to the pan and bring to a low boil. Allow the mixture to reduce by then whisk in the cornstarch with the mixture still at a low boil. Season the sauce to taste with the salt then strain the sauce through a chinoix or fine sauce strainer.
Step 5: To serve: Place a 1 oz. pool of the sauce on a plate and fan the carved turkey over the sauce.
instructions.zh: 步驟1：對於土耳其：步驟2：方法：預熱烤箱至350度。在土耳其乳房中橫向切一個口袋。朱利安（Julienne）乾果和菠菜，並用切碎的蔥在碗中混合。將混合物塞入火雞乳房，然後用鹽和胡椒粉調味，塗上融化的黃油，並用箔紙包裹。加熱一個大煎鍋，直到非常熱，然後將火雞放在鍋中，允許每一側煮約兩分鐘，或者直到所有側面都變成金黃色（您必須在箔中窺視以檢查）。將鍋放在烤箱中，煮15分鐘，然後翻轉乳房，再煮20至30分鐘，或直到將探針溫度計插入乳房中間的溫度計為165度。將鍋從烤箱中取出，然後將鍋放在切菜板上，靜置五分鐘。從箔紙上取出火雞，然後雕刻成1英寸厚的紀念章3：用於調味料：步驟4：方法：在非反應性鍋中，將醋和糖煮沸。煮混合物，直到糖開始焦糖化（棕色）。迅速將湯添加到混合物中，以使焦糖不會燃燒，然後將芙蓉花加入鍋中並煮沸。使混合物減少在玉米澱粉中，而混合物仍處於低沸點。調味調味醬，然後用鹽調味，然後通過縫隙或細調味料過濾醬。在盤子上的醬汁池，然後將雕刻的火雞在醬汁上扇動。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Prepare Tomato Coulis:
Step 2: Make shallow incisions with a paring knife around the tomato stems and scoop out the stems.
Step 3: Make a shallow X-incision in bottom of tomatoes.
Step 4: Bring a large saucepan of water to a rolling boil.
Step 5: Plunge tomatoes into water for 10 seconds.
Step 6: Remove and submerge tomatoes in bowl of ice water.
Step 7: Remove the cooled tomatoes from the water.
Step 8: Peel away skin.
Step 9: Remove seeds and coarsely chop tomatoes.
Step 10: Combine tomatoes, garlic and olive oil in bowl of food processor.
Step 11: Process until smooth.
Step 12: Add salt and pepper.
Step 13: Let Tomato Coulis stand at room temperature for one hour before serving.
Step 14: Prepare Eggplant:
Step 15: Preheat oven broiler or prepare grill.
Step 16: Lightly brush eggplant slices on both sides with olive oil.
Step 17: Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Step 18: Arrange on baking tray and grill in oven, turning once, until golden brown, about 3 minutes per side.
Step 19: Or grill on barbecue, turning, until golden brown and cooked through.
Step 20: Arrange Stacks:
Step 21: Combine garlic and goat cheese in a small bowl.
Step 22: Add salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste.
Step 23: Arrange 1/2 of the eggplant slices on platter.
Step 24: Spoon 2 teaspoons goat cheese over.
Step 25: Top with 1 basil leaf.
Step 26: Place second eggplant slice on basil leaf.
Step 27: Top with one teaspoon goat cheese and basil leaf.
Step 28: Lightly drizzle 2-3 teaspoons Tomato Coulis over and around the eggplant stack.
Step 29: Garnish with one teaspoon grated Pecorino Romano cheese.
Step 30: Serve immediately.
instructions.zh: 步驟1：準備番茄庫里斯：步驟2：用番茄莖上的劍刀做淺切口並sc起莖。從水中的西紅柿。步驟8：剝皮的皮膚。步驟9：去除種子並切碎西紅柿。步驟10：將西紅柿，大蒜和橄欖油混合在食品加工碗中。燒烤。步驟16：用橄欖油在兩側輕輕刷茄子切片。步驟17：撒上鹽和胡椒。碗。步驟22：加入鹽和新鮮的黑胡椒粉調味。步驟23：在盤子上排列1/2的茄子切片。步驟24：湯匙2茶匙山羊奶酪覆蓋。步驟25：頂部1 basil Leaf.Step 26：將第二個茄子片放在Basil Leaf.Step 27上。茶匙番茄庫里斯（Tomato Coulis）在茄子堆上及其周圍。

instructions.en: In a medium sized bowl mix together the pretzel crumbs and the butter. Press the pretzels onto the bottom of an 8-inch springform pan, or a round pan lined with plastic wrap. Freeze the crust for at least one hour. In your mixers bowl, beat together the cream cheese, sugar, zest, juice, and mint. Mix until well blended. Whisk in the whipped topping. Spoon the filling over the crust. Freeze for at least 6 hours. Over night is best. Carefully remove the pie from the pan and top it with some crushed pretzels and thin slices of lime. Keep it frozen.

instructions.en:
Step 1: PREHEAT oven to 350F
Step 2: GREASE 9x13 inch rectangular cake pan
Step 3: COMBINE crust ingredients and press with fingertips into pan
Step 4: BAKE for 20 minutes
Step 5: FILLING: As crust is baking combine all remaining ingredients and whisk together until well combined.
Step 6: When crust is baked, remove from oven, fill with lemon filling; return to oven
Step 7: BAKE for an addition 23-25 minutes (don't let the top get overbrown - see pic above for what you are looking for!)
Step 8: REMOVE from oven and allow to cool for 1/2 hr on a wire rack.
Step 9: Tip: To remove from baking pan, cut the bars in half and remove each half with a large flexible spatula. Then finish cutting bars into squares
Step 10: DUST with sifted icing sugar and you are DONE.
Step 11: Last steps - VERY IMPORTANT: Put on a pot of tea and I will be there shortly ;)
Step 12: See recipe PLUS photos @ my blog: http://lemondropsfoodie.blogspot.com/2011/02/luscious-lemon-bars.html

Step 2: Preheat oven to 350.
Step 3: Cream butter and sugar together in your mixer, scraping the sides of your bowl.
Step 4: Add your egg and mix well.
Step 5: Mix in baking powder, baking soda, Kool-Aid and cornstarch.
Step 6: Once its well mixed (the Kool-Aid will be mixed once it turns your dough pink), add a drop of pink food coloring, if more color is desired.
Step 7: Next, start adding your flour a half cup at a time until its all added.Roll the dough into walnut-sized balls and roll in the powder sugar, giving them a light coating.

summary.zh: 從頭到尾，Boeuf Bourgignon大約需要45分鐘。每份$ 8.41 $ 8.41，您可以獲得一門服務4的主要課程。這道菜的一部分含有約76克蛋白質，54克脂肪和總共980卡路里的卡路里。這個食譜受到2個美食和廚師的喜愛。如果您手頭上有牛肉湯，麵粉，百里香和其他一些成分，則可以做到。它是由Goodista帶給您的。總體而言，該食譜的穩固片分數為78％。 Boeuf Bourgignon，Slow Cooker Boeuf Bourgignon和Slow Cooker Boeuf Bourgignon與此食譜非常相似。

instructions.en: Preheat oven to 160 C (325 F). In a pan saut the mushrooms in butter till brown and soft. Keep aside. In a deep-bottomed pot/cesserole, saut the bacon in 1 tbsp oil over moderate heat for 2 to 3 minutes to brown lightly. Remove to a side dish with a slotted spoon. Reheat the pan until fat is almost smoking before you saut the beef. Saut the beef in the bacon fat in batches making sure not to crowd the pieces (the pieces need to brown on all sides, not sweat). Add the browned pieces of beef to the bacon. Lower the heat to medium. In the same fat, add the onions, shallots and carrots. Cook till the carrots soften. Add the cooked veggies to the beef and bacon. Pour out the sauting fat. Return beef to the casserole. Then sprinkle on the flour and toss to coat the beef lightly with the flour. Stir everything around till the flour is cooked and no white traces of it remain. Add the bacon and veggies and season with salt and pepper. Stir in the cognac and enough stock so that the meat is barely covered. Add the garlic, thyme, parsley, tomato paste and bay leaf. Bring to simmer on top of the stove. Cover the casserole and set it in the oven. Cook for 2 1/2 to 3 hours. About 1 hour into the cooking add the mushrooms and stir in the cocoa powder. Return to the oven. The stew is done when the meat is fork-soft.
instructions.zh: 預熱烤箱至160 C（325 F）。在鍋中炒蘑菇，黃油直至棕色和柔軟。放在一邊。在深底鍋/腸塞勒中，用中火在1湯匙油中將培根炒2至3分鐘，以輕輕褐色。用開槽的勺子將其移至配菜。在炒牛肉之前將鍋重新加熱，直到脂肪幾乎吸煙。批量炒培根脂肪中的牛肉，以確保不要擠滿碎片（這些碎片需要在各個方面呈褐色，而不是汗水）。將牛肉的褐色碎片加到培根中。將熱量降低至中等。在同一脂肪中，加入洋蔥，蔥和胡蘿蔔。煮至胡蘿蔔變軟。將煮熟的蔬菜加入牛肉和培根。倒出炒脂肪。將牛肉返回砂鍋。然後撒在麵粉上，然後用麵粉輕輕地塗上牛肉。攪拌周圍的所有東西，直到麵粉煮熟，並且沒有白色的痕跡。加入培根和蔬菜，然後加鹽和胡椒粉調味。加入乾邑白蘭地和足夠的庫存，使肉幾乎沒有覆蓋。加入大蒜，百里香，歐芹，番茄醬和貝葉。帶上火爐頂部的小火。蓋住砂鍋，並將其設置在烤箱中。煮2 1/2至3小時。烹飪後約1小時加入蘑菇，然後加入可可粉。返回烤箱。燉肉是在肉叉時完成的。

summary.en: Eggplant Parmesan Roll-Ups might be just the hor d'oeuvre you are searching for. This recipe serves 4. One serving contains 669 calories, 21g of protein, and 45g of fat. For $3.63 per serving, this recipe covers 25% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. If you have olive oil, basil, garlic, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. It is a pretty expensive recipe for fans of Mediterranean food. 2 people found this recipe to be yummy and satisfying. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 45 minutes. It is brought to you by Foodista. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 78%. This score is pretty good. If you like this recipe, take a look at these similar recipes: Eggplant Roll-Ups, Grilled Eggplant Roll-Ups, and Eggplant and Mozzarella Roll-Ups.
summary.zh: 茄子帕爾馬干酪的捲起可能只是您正在尋找的hor d'eeuvre。該食譜提供4。一份含有669卡路里，21克蛋白質和45克脂肪。每份3.63美元，此食譜涵蓋了您對維生素和礦物質的每日需求的25％。如果您手頭上有橄欖油，羅勒，大蒜和其他一些成分，則可以製作。對於地中海食品的粉絲來說，這是一個非常昂貴的食譜。 2個人發現​​這個食譜令人愉悅且令人滿意。從製備到盤子，此食譜大約需要45分鐘。它是由Goodista帶給您的。考慮到所有因素，我們認為這個食譜值得獲得78％的勺子得分。這個分數很好。如果您喜歡此食譜，請看一下這些類似的食譜：茄子捲起，烤茄子捲起，茄子和馬蘇里拉奶酪卷。

instructions.en: Preheat oven to 350F and put water for linguine on to boil. Heat 1 teaspoon oil in a 2-quart heavy saucepan over medium heat and add onion and green pepper. Cook until just tender. Add garlic and red pepper flakes and continue to cook another 30 seconds. Add tomatoes and 1/2 teaspoon salt and simmer, uncovered, stirring occasionally, until slightly thickened, 15 to 20 minutes. Grill eggplant while sauce cooks. Heat grill pan over high heat until hot. Peel skin from eggplant and discard. Cut eggplant long-ways into 8 (1/3-inch-thick) slices. Lightly rush both sides of slices with 2 teaspoons oil (total), then season with salt and pepper. Grill slices in batches, turning over once l, until golden brown and tender, about 4 minutes, then transfer to a tray. Stir together ricotta and 1/2 cup Parmesan, basil, pepper, and remaining salt. Divide cheese mixture among slices. Roll up each slice. Place rolls in a small casserole dish and bake until cheese starts to melt, about 10 minutes. Meanwhile, cook linguine to package directions. Serve rolls over linguine, topped with sauce and sprinkled with 1 tablespoon Parmesan each.
instructions.zh: 將烤箱預熱至350F，然後將水煮沸。用中火加熱1茶匙油，然後加入洋蔥和綠辣椒。煮至嫩。加入大蒜和紅辣椒片，繼續再煮30秒。加入西紅柿和1/2茶匙鹽，小火煮，偶爾攪拌，直至略微增厚，15至20分鐘。烤茄子烤茄子。用高火加熱烤鍋，直到熱。從茄子剝皮並丟棄皮膚。將茄子的長途切成8（1/3英寸厚）切片。用2茶匙油（總共）輕輕地將切片的兩面刺入，然後用鹽和胡椒粉調味。分批燒烤切片，翻轉一次L，直到金黃色並變嫩，大約4分鐘，然後轉移到托盤上。將意大利乳清乾酪和1/2杯帕爾馬干酪，羅勒，胡椒粉和剩餘鹽攪拌在一起。將奶酪混合物分為切片。捲起每個切片。將捲卷放入一個小砂鍋中，烘烤，直到奶酪開始融化，大約10分鐘。同時，將語言煮熟到包裝方向。在扁麵條上塗卷，上面撒上醬汁，每個撒上1湯匙帕爾瑪乾酪。

title.en: Banana in brown sugar ice cream
title.zh: 黃色糖冰淇淋中的香蕉

summary.en: You can never have too many hor d'oeuvre recipes, so give Bananan in brown sugar ice cream a try. One serving contains 343 calories, 3g of protein, and 17g of fat. For 98 cents per serving, this recipe covers 9% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 6. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, dairy free, lacto ovo vegetarian, and fodmap friendly diet. A mixture of vanillan extract, lemon juice, full-fat cream, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so flavorful. 5 people were glad they tried this recipe. Summer will be even more special with this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. It is brought to you by Foodista. Taking all factors into account, this recipe earns a spoonacular score of 42%, which is pretty good. Similar recipes are Banana-brown Sugar Ice Cream, Spiced Banana & Brown Sugar Ice Cream, and Brown Sugar Bananan Ice Cream with Brownie Chunks.
summary.zh: 您永遠不會有太多的作品食譜，因此請嘗試使用黑糖冰淇淋的Bananan。一份含有343卡路里，3G蛋白質和17克脂肪。對於每份98美分，此食譜涵蓋了您對維生素和礦物質的日常需求的9％。此食譜提供6。如果您遵循不含麩質，無乳製品，乳酸元素素食和Fodmap友好飲食，這是一個不錯的選擇。將香草提取物，檸檬汁，全脂奶油和少量其他成分的混合物混合在一起，使這種食譜變得如此美味。 5個人很高興他們嘗試了這個食譜。這個食譜將更加特別。從準備到盤子，此食譜大約需要45分鐘。它是由Goodista帶給您的。考慮到所有因素，該食譜的勺子得分為42％，這非常好。類似的食譜包括香蕉棕色糖冰淇淋，五香香蕉和紅糖冰淇淋以及帶布朗尼塊的紅糖香蕉冰淇淋。

instructions.en:
Step 1: In a wide skillet or saucepan, heat the brown sugar with one-quarter of the coconut milk or sour cream, stirring, until smooth and bubbly.
Step 2: Add the bananas and salt, and continue to cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the bananas are soft and completely cooked through.
Step 3: Remove from heat and stir in the remaining coconut milk or sour cream, rum and vanilla. If it tastes too sweet, add a few drops of fresh lemon juice.
Step 4: Puree in a blender or food processor until completely smooth.
Step 5: Chill thoroughly for 1 hour or overnight, then pour into the ice cream maker and proceed according to the manufacturers instructions.
Step 6: Before serving, take it out for 5-10 minutes before serving, or longer, so it comes to the right scooping temperature
Step 7: Light note: if you use sour cream, when cooking the bananas, the mixture might curdle a bit. Nothing to worry, just proceed with the recipe and itll smooth out when blended.
Step 8: Easy suggestion: ice cream is best served in chilled glass or porcelain bowls. Scoop it with a hot, but dry, ice-cream spoon (soak it in boiling water, then wipe dry).
instructions.zh: 步驟1：在寬煎鍋或鍋中，用四分之一的椰奶或酸奶油加熱紅糖，攪拌，直至光滑且起泡。 If it tastes too sweet, add a few drops of fresh lemon juice.Step 4: Puree in a blender or food processor until completely smooth.Step 5: Chill thoroughly for 1 hour or overnight, then pour into the ice cream maker and proceed according to the manufacturers instructions.Step 6: Before serving, take it out for 5-10 minutes before serving, or longer, so it comes to the right scooping temperatureStep 7: Light note: if you use sour cream, when烹飪香蕉，混合物可能會凝結一點。不用擔心，只需進行食譜，然後在混合時會變得光滑。步驟8：簡單建議：冰淇淋最好在冰冷的玻璃或瓷器碗中提供。用熱但乾燥的冰淇淋勺將其oop（將其浸泡在沸水中，然後擦乾）。

summary.en: Pumpkin soup with wine might be a good recipe to expand your hor d'oeuvre collection. This recipe makes 4 servings with 461 calories, 3g of protein, and 28g of fat each. For $5.13 per serving, this recipe covers 4% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 14 people have made this recipe and would make it again. A mixture of sage leaves, red wine, vegetable stock from 1 cube, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so yummy. Autumn will be even more special with this recipe. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free and lacto ovo vegetarian diet. It is brought to you by Foodista. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 13%, this dish is rather bad. Users who liked this recipe also liked Red Wine Braised Venison over Pumpkin Risotto, Ginger and Wine Poached Pears with Pumpkin Whipped Cream, and Pumpkin Ravioli In A Parmesan Fondue With A Red Wine Reduction.
summary.zh: 與葡萄酒的南瓜湯可能是擴展您的作品系列的好食譜。該食譜可提供4份，每份461卡路里，3g蛋白質和28克脂肪。每份5.13美元，此食譜涵蓋了您對維生素和礦物質的每日需求的4％。 14人製作了這個食譜，並將再次製作。將鼠尾草葉子，紅酒，1立方體的蔬菜混合在一起，以及少量其他成分，使這種食譜如此美味。秋季將在此食譜中更加特別。如果您遵循無麩質和乳酸乳酸素食，這是一個不錯的選擇。它是由Goodista帶給您的。從準備到盤子，此食譜大約需要45分鐘。這道菜的勺子得分為13％，很糟糕。喜歡這種食譜的用戶還喜歡紅酒在南瓜燴飯，薑和葡萄酒撒上南瓜奶油和南瓜餛飩上燉的鹿肉，並在帕瑪森的帕瑪森糖粉中，減少了紅酒。

instructions.en: Cut the pumpkin into large chunks, and place on a parchment or foil-lined baking sheet. Drizzle with oil and roast at 200C until fork-tender and golden. In a blender mash the roasted pumpkin until smooth. Transfer into a soup pot. Add cream, sour cream, wine and vegetable stock, stir and combine. Bring the soup to a boil, then immediately remove from the flame. Sprinkle with chopped fresh sage leaves serve with croutons.
instructions.zh: 將南瓜切成大塊，然後放在羊皮紙或襯砌的烤盤上。淋上油，在200攝氏度上烤，直到叉子和金色。在攪拌器中，將烤南瓜搗碎，直至光滑。轉移到湯鍋中。加入奶油，酸奶油，葡萄酒和蔬菜湯，攪拌並混合。將湯煮沸，然後立即從火焰中移開。撒上切碎的新鮮鼠尾草葉，配以麵包丁。

summary.en: The recipe Asian Chickpea Lettuce Wraps could satisfy your Asian craving in approximately 45 minutes. Watching your figure? This gluten free and dairy free recipe has 52 calories, 1g of protein, and 3g of fat per serving. For 30 cents per serving, you get a hor d'oeuvre that serves 6. If you have basil, rice vinegar, hoison sauce, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. 15 people have tried and liked this recipe. It is brought to you by Foodista. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 66%. This score is solid. Similar recipes are Asian Chickpea Lettuce Wraps, Asian Lettuce Wraps, and Asian Lettuce Wraps.
summary.zh: 食譜亞洲鷹嘴豆生菜包裹可以在大約45分鐘內滿足您的亞洲渴望。看著你的身影？這種無麩質和無乳製品配方具有52卡路里，1克蛋白質和3g脂肪。每份30美分，您會得到一個供應6的Oeuvre。如果您有Basil，米醋，Hoison醬和其他一些食材，則可以做到。 15人嘗試並喜歡這個食譜。它是由Goodista帶給您的。考慮到所有因素，我們認為這個食譜的勺子得分為66％。這個分數很紮實。類似的食譜是亞洲鷹嘴豆生菜包裝，亞洲生菜包裝和亞洲生菜包裹。

instructions.en: Drain and rinse both cans of chickpeas. Place chickpeas in a food processor and puree in 5-10 second increments. You do not want to turn the chickpeas into a mash, you simply want to grind them into pieces. Add 1 tbsp of olive oil to a pan and heat. Add the chickpeas and let cook over medium heat for 3-4 minutes, continuously stirring so as not to burn. Add remaining ingredients, except basil, and stir. Cook over low heat for 10 minutes, stirring occassionally. If using basil leaves, add them and cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring the basil in and allowing it to wilt. Wash lettuce leaves and pat dry. Spoon a healthy serving of chickpea mixture onto lettuce wraps and serve immediately. Drizzle with sirachi sauce if desired.
instructions.zh: 排幹並沖洗兩罐鷹嘴豆。將鷹嘴豆放在食品加工機中，並以5-10秒的增量果泥。您不想將鷹嘴豆變成土豆泥，您只想將它​​們磨碎成碎片。將1湯匙橄欖油加入鍋中並加熱。加入鷹嘴豆，用中火煮3-4分鐘，連續攪拌以免燃燒。添加剩餘的成分，除了羅勒，並攪拌。用低火煮10分鐘，偶爾攪拌。如果使用羅勒葉，加入它們並煮1-2分鐘，將羅勒攪拌進去，然後讓它枯萎。洗萵苣葉，然後拍幹。將健康的鷹嘴豆混合物倒入生菜捲中，然後立即食用。如果需要，淋上sirachi醬。

summary.en: Chocolate Wafers might be a good recipe to expand your dessert recipe box. For 5 cents per serving, this recipe covers 1% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe makes 40 servings with 30 calories, 1g of protein, and 1g of fat each. 10 people have tried and liked this recipe. If you have ap flour, baking soda, cocoa powder, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. It is brought to you by Foodista. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 45 minutes. Overall, this recipe earns an improvable spoonacular score of 8%. Chocolate Mint Wafers, Chocolate Caramel Wafers, and Chocolate Peppermint Wafers are very similar to this recipe.
summary.zh: 巧克力晶片可能是擴展甜點食譜盒的好食譜。對於每份食物5美分，該食譜涵蓋了您對維生素和礦物質的每日需求的1％。該食譜將40份含30卡路里，1克蛋白質和1克脂肪的食譜。有10個人嘗試並喜歡這個食譜。如果您有AP麵粉，小蘇打，可可粉和其他一些成分，則可以製作。它是由Goodista帶給您的。從製備到盤子，此食譜大約需要45分鐘。總體而言，此食譜的佔孢子分數為8％。巧克力薄荷晶片，巧克力焦糖晶片和巧克力薄荷晶片與此食譜非常相似。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Combine the flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt in a small bowl and mix together thoroughly with a whisk or fork. Set aside.
Step 2: Beat the butter and margarine with an electric mixer for a few seconds just until blended.
Step 3: Add the granulated sugar, brown sugar, and vanilla and beat at high speed for about 1 minute.
Step 4: Beat in the egg white.
Step 5: Add the flour mixture and mix on low speed, just until incorporated.
Step 6: Gather the dough together with your hands and form it into a 9- to 10-inch log.
Step 7: Wrap the log in wax paper or foil. Fold or twist the ends of the paper without pinching or flattening the log
Step 8: Refrigerate for at least 45 minutes, or until needed.
Step 9: Preheat the oven to 350F. Position racks in the upper and lower thirds of the oven.
Step 10: Use a sharp knife to cut the dough log into slices a scant 1/4" thick.
Step 11: Place 1 inch apart on cookie sheets and bake for 12 - 14 minutes, or until the cookies puff and crackle on top, then begin to settle down slightly.
Step 12: Rotate baking sheets from top to bottom and front to back about halfway through the baking time to ensure even baking.
Step 13: Slide the parchment or foil onto cooling racks and cool the cookies completely before storing or stacking.
instructions.zh: 步驟1：將麵粉，可可，小蘇打和鹽混合在一個小碗中，然後用攪拌或叉徹底混合在一起。放在一邊。步驟2：用電動攪拌機攪拌黃油和人造黃油，直到融合在一起直至混合。蠟紙或箔紙中的日誌。折疊或扭轉紙張的末端，而無需夾克或使logstep 8：冷藏至少45分鐘，或直到需要直到需要。步驟9：將烤箱預熱至350f。烤箱上部和下三分之一的位置架子。步驟10：用鋒利的刀將麵團登錄到切片中，切成薄片1/4英寸厚。步驟11：將1英寸相距1英寸，然後烘烤12-14分鐘，或者餅乾蓬鬆和直到上面的裂紋，然後從頂部稍微下來，然後從頂部旋轉烘烤，然後又旋轉烘烤，然後旋轉烘烤，然後旋轉烘烤，然後又旋轉烘焙，然後又旋轉到一半。 13：將羊皮紙或箔紙滑到冷卻架上，然後在存儲或堆疊之前完全冷卻餅乾。
